T06vasvvmsu:1: cittamātraṃ bho jinaputrā yad uta traidhātukam iti sūtrāt /
T06vasvvmsu:2: cittaṃ mano vijñānaṃ vijñaptiś ceti paryāyāḥ /
T06vasvvmsu:10: na ca kṛtyakriyā yuktā vijñaptir yadi nārthataḥ // 2 //
T06vasvvmsu:12: yadi vinā rūpādyarthena rūpādivijñaptir utpadyate na rūpādyarthāt /
T06vasvvmsu:13: kasmāt kvacid deśa utpadyate na sarvatra /
T06vasvvmsu:14: tatraiva ca deśe kadācid utpadyate na sarvadā /
T06vasvvmsu:15: taddeśakālapratiṣṭhitānāṃ sarveṣāṃ saṃtānāniyama utpadyate na kevalam ekasya /
T06vasvvmsu:17: kasmād yat taimirikaiḥ keśabhramarādi dṛśyate tena keśādikriyā na kriyate na ca tad anyair na kriyate /
T06vasvvmsu:18: yad annapānavastraviṣāyudhādi svapne dṛśyate tenānnādikriyā na kriyate na ca tad anyair na kriyate /
T06vasvvmsu:19: gandharvanagareṇāsattvān nagarakriyā na kriyate na ca tad anyair na kriyate /
T06vasvvmsu:20: tasmād asadabhāvāvabhāsane deśakālaniyamaḥ saṃtānāniyamaḥ kṛtyakriyā ca na yujyate /
T06vasvvmsu:25: svapne vināpy arthena kvacid eva deśe kiṃcid bhramarārāmastrīpurūṣādikaṃ dṛśyate na sarvatra /
T06vasvvmsu:26: tatraiva ca deśe kadācid dṛśyate na sarvakālam iti siddho vināpy arthena deśakālaniyamaḥ /
T06vasvvmsu:35: tulyakarmavipākāvasthā hi pretāḥ sarve 'pi pūyapūrṇāṃ nadīṃ paśyanti naika eva /
T06vasvvmsu:36: yathā pūyapūrṇām evaṃ mūtrapurīṣādipūrṇāṃ daṇḍāsidharaiś ca puruṣair adhiṣṭhitām ity ādigrahaṇena /
T06vasvvmsu:37: evaṃ saṃtānāniyamo vijñaptinām asaty apy arthe siddhaḥ //
T06vasvvmsu:40: yathā svapne dvayasamāpattim antareṇa śukravisargalakṣaṇaḥ svapnopaghātaḥ /
T06vasvvmsu:41: evaṃ tāvad anyānyair dṛṣṭāntair deśakālaniyamādicatuṣṭayaṃ siddhaṃ /
T06vasvvmsu:48: yathā hi narakeṣu nārakāṇāṃ narakapālādidarśanaṃ deśakālaniyamena siddhaṃ /
T06vasvvmsu:50: sarveṣāṃ ca naikasyaiva taiś ca tadbādhanaṃ siddham asatsv api narakapālādiṣu samānasvakarmavipākādhipatyāt /
T06vasvvmsu:51: tathānyatrāpi sarvam etad deśakālaniyamādicatuṣtayaṃ siddham iti veditavyaṃ //
T06vasvvmsu:52: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ narakapālās te ca śvāno vāyasāś ca sattvā neṣyante /
T06vasvvmsu:56: parasparaṃ yātayatām ime nārakā ime narakapālā iti vyavasthā na syāt /
T06vasvvmsu:57: tulyākṛtipramāṇabalānāṃ ca parasparaṃ yātayatāṃ na tathā bhayaṃ syāt /
T06vasvvmsu:58: dāhaduḥkhaṃ ca pradīptāyām ayomayyāṃ bhūmāv asahamānāḥ kathaṃ tatra parān yātayeyuḥ /
T06vasvvmsu:61: evaṃ narakeṣu tiryakpretaviśeṣāṇāṃ narakapālādīnāṃ saṃbhavaḥ syāt /
T06vasvvmsu:62: tiraścāṃ saṃbhavaḥ svarge yathā na narake tathā /
T06vasvvmsu:63: na pretānāṃ yatas tajjaṃ duḥkhaṃ nānubhavanti te // 5 //
T06vasvvmsu:64: ye hi tiryañcaḥ svarge saṃbhavanti te tadbhājanalokasukhasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā tatra saṃbhūtās tajjaṃ sukhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
T06vasvvmsu:65: na caiva narakapālādayo nārakaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
T06vasvvmsu:66: tasmān na tiraścāṃ saṃbhavo yukto nāpi pretānāṃ //
T06vasvvmsu:68: nārakāṇāṃ karmabhis tatra bhūtaviśeṣāḥ saṃbhavanti varṇākṛtipramāṇabalaviśiṣṭā ye narakapālādisaṃjñāṃ pratilabhante /
T06vasvvmsu:70: yad dvidhāṃ hastavikṣepādikriyāṃ kurvanto dṛśyante bhayotpādanārthaṃ /
T06vasvvmsu:71: yathā meṣākṛtayaḥ parvatā āgacchanto gacchanto 'yaḥśālmalīvane ca kaṇṭakā adhomukhībhavanta ūrddhvamukhībhavantaś ceti /
T06vasvvmsu:73: yadi tatkarmabhis tatra bhūtānāṃ saṃbhavas tathā /
T06vasvvmsu:74: iṣyate pariṇāmaś ca kiṃ vijñānasya neṣyate // 6 //
T06vasvvmsu:75: vijñānasyaiva tatkarmabhis tathā pariṇāmaḥ kasmān neṣyate kiṃ punar bhūtāni kalpyante //
T06vasvvmsu:78: tatraiva neṣyate yatra vāsanā kiṃ nu kāraṇaṃ // 7 //
T06vasvvmsu:79: yena hi karmaṇā nārakāṇāṃ tatra tādṛśo bhūtānāṃ saṃbhavaḥ kalpyate pariṇāmaś ca tasya karmaṇo vāsanā teṣāṃ vijñānasaṃtānasaṃniviṣṭā nānyatra
T06vasvvmsu:80: yatraiva ca vāsanā tatraiva tasyāḥ phalaṃ tādṛśo vijñānapariṇāmaḥ kiṃ neṣyate /
T06vasvvmsu:81: yatra vāsanā nāsti tatra tasyāḥ phalaṃ kalpyata iti kim atra kāraṇaṃ //
T06vasvvmsu:83: yadi vijñānam eva rūpādipratibhāsaṃ syān na rūpādiko 'rthas tadā rūpādyāyatanāstitvaṃ bhagavatā noktaṃ syāt /
T06vasvvmsu:87: yathāsti sattva upapāduka ity uktaṃ bhagavatā abhiprāyavaśāc cittasaṃtatyanucchedam āyatyām abhipretya /
T06vasvvmsu:88: nāstīha sattva ātmā vā dharmās tv ete sahetukāḥ
T06vasvvmsu:90: evaṃ rūpādyāyatanāstitvam apy uktaṃ bhagavatā taddeśanāvineyajanam adhikṛtyety ābhiprāyikaṃ tad vacanaṃ //
T06vasvvmsu:95: rūpapratibhāsā vijñaptir yataḥ svabījāt pariṇāmaviśeṣaprāptād utpadyate tac ca bījaṃ yat pratibhāsā ca sā te tasyā vijñapteś cakṣūrūpāyatanatvena
T06vasvvmsu:97: evaṃ yāvat spraṣṭavyapratibhāsā vijñaptir yataḥ svabījāt pariṇāmaviśeṣaprāptād utpadyate
T06vasvvmsu:98: tac ca bījaṃ yat pratibhāsā ca sā te tasyā kāyaspraṣṭavyāyatanatvena yathākranaṃ
T06vasvvmsu:100: evaṃ punar abhiprāyavaśena deśayitvā ko guṇāḥ /
T06vasvvmsu:104: na tu kaścid eko draṣṭāsti na yāvan mantety evaṃ viditvā ye pudgalanairātmyadeśanāvineyās te pudgalanairātmyaṃ praviśanti /
T06vasvvmsu:109: vijñaptimātram idaṃ rūpādidharmapratibhāsam utpadyate na tu rūpādilakṣaṇo dharmaḥ ko 'py astīti viditvā /
T06vasvvmsu:110: yadi tarhi sarvathā dharmo nāsti tad api vijñaptimātraṃ nāstīti kathaṃ tarhi vyavasthāpyate /
T06vasvvmsu:111: na khalu sarvathā dharmo nāstīty evaṃ dharmanairātmyapraveśo bhavati / api tu /
T06vasvvmsu:113: yo bālair dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo grāhyagrāhakādiḥ parikalpatas tena kalpitenātmanā teṣāṃ nairātmyaṃ na tv anabhilāpyenātmanā yo buddhānāṃ viṣaya iti /
T06vasvvmsu:114: evaṃ vijñaptimātrasyāpi vijñaptyantaraparikalpitenātmanā nairātmyapraveśāt vijñaptimātravyavasthāpanayā sarvadharmāṇāṃ nairātmyapraveśo bhavati na tu tadastitvāpavādāt /
T06vasvvmsu:115: itarathā hi vijñapter api vijñaptyantaram arthaḥ syād iti vijñaptimātratvaṃ na sidhyetārthavatītvād vijñaptīnāṃ //
T06vasvvmsu:116: kathaṃ punar idaṃ pratyetavyam anenābhiprāyeṇa bhagavatā rūpādyāyatanāstitvam uktaṃ na punaḥ santy eva tāni yāni rūpādivijñaptīnāṃ pratyekaṃ viṣayībhavanti iti / yasmāt /
T06vasvvmsu:117: na tad ekaṃ na cānekaṃ viṣayaḥ paramāṇuśaḥ /
T06vasvvmsu:118: na ca te saṃhatā yasmāt paramāṇur na sidhyati // 11 //
T06vasvvmsu:120: yat tadrūpādikam āyatanaṃ rūpādivijñaptīnāṃ pratyekaṃ viṣayaḥ syāt tad ekaṃ vā syād yathāvayavirūpaṃ kalpyate vaiśeṣikaiḥ /
T06vasvvmsu:123: na tāvad ekaṃ viṣayo bhavaty avayavebhyo 'nyasyāvayavirūpasya kvacid apy agrahaṇāt /
T06vasvvmsu:127: yasmāt paramāṇur ekaṃ dravyaṃ na sidhyati //
T06vasvvmsu:130: ṣaḍbhyo digbhyaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ paramāṇubhir yugapad yoge sati paramāṇoḥ ṣaḍaṃśatā prāpnoti /
T06vasvvmsu:134: atha ya evaikasya paramāṇor deśaḥ sa eva ṣaṇṇāṃ /
T06vasvvmsu:135: tena sarveṣāṃ samānadeśatvāt sarvaḥ piṇḍaḥ paramāṇumātraḥ syāt parasparāvyatirekād iti na kaścit piṇḍo dṛśyaḥ syāt //
T06vasvvmsu:138: saṃhatās tu parasparaṃ saṃyujyanta iti kāśmīravaibhāṣikās ta idaṃ praṣṭavyāḥ /
T06vasvvmsu:139: yaḥ paramāṇūnāṃ saṃghāto na sa tebhyo 'rthāntaram iti /
T06vasvvmsu:143: atha saṃghātā apy anyonyaṃ na saṃyujyante /
T06vasvvmsu:144: na tarhi paramāṇūnāṃ niravayavatvāt saṃyogo na sidhyatīti vaktavyaṃ /
T06vasvvmsu:146: tasmāt paramāṇur ekaṃ dravyaṃ na sidhyati /
T06vasvvmsu:147: yadi ca paramāṇoḥ saṃyoga iṣyate yadi vā neṣyate /
T06vasvvmsu:149: anyo hi paramāṇoḥ pūrvadigbhāgo yāvad adhodigbhāga iti digbhāgabhede sati kathaṃ tadātmakasya paramāṇor ekatvaṃ yokṣyate /
T06vasvvmsu:151: yady ekaikasya paramāṇor digbhāgabhedo na syād ādityodaye katham anyatra chāyā bhavaty anyatrātapaḥ /
T06vasvvmsu:152: na hi tasyānyaḥ pradeśo 'sti yatrātapo na syāt /
T06vasvvmsu:153: āvaraṇaṃ ca kathaṃ bhavati paramāṇoḥ paramāṇvantareṇa yadi digbhāgabhedo neṣyate /
T06vasvvmsu:154: na hi kaścid api paramāṇoḥ parabhāgo 'sti yatrāgamanād anyenānyasya pratighātaḥ syāt /
T06vasvvmsu:155: asati ca pratighāte sarveṣāṃ samānadeśatvāt sarvaḥ saṃghātaḥ (Vvs_8)
T06vasvvmsu:157: kim evaṃ neṣyate piṇḍasya te chāyāvṛtī na paramāṇor iti /
T06vasvvmsu:158: kiṃ khalu paramāṇubhyo 'nyaḥ piṇḍa iṣyate yasya te syātāṃ / nety āha /
T06vasvvmsu:159: anyo na piṇḍaś cen na tasya te // 14 //
T06vasvvmsu:160: yadi nānyaḥ paramāṇubhyaḥ piṇḍa iṣyate na te tasyeti siddhaṃ bhavati /
T06vasvvmsu:161: saṃniveśaparikalpa eṣaḥ paramāṇuḥ saṃghāta iti vā //
T06vasvvmsu:167: yat tac cakṣurādīnāṃ viṣayo nīlapītādikam iṣyate kiṃ tad ekaṃ dravyam atha vā tad anekam iti /
T06vasvvmsu:170: ekatve na krameṇetir yugapan na grahāgrahau /
T06vasvvmsu:171: vicchinnānekavṛttiś ca sūkṣmānīkṣā ca no bhavet // 15 //
T06vasvvmsu:172: yadi yāvad vicchinnaṃ nānekaṃ cakṣuṣo viṣayas tad ekaṃ dravyaṃ kalpyate pṛthivyāṃ krameṇetir na syād gamanam ity arthaḥ /
T06vasvvmsu:174: arvāgbhāgasya ca grahaṇaṃ parabhāgasya cāgrahaṇaṃ yugapan na syāt /
T06vasvvmsu:175: na hi tasyaiva tadānīṃ grahaṇaṃ cāgrahaṇaṃ ca yuktam /
T06vasvvmsu:176: vicchinnasya cānekasya hastyaśvādikasyaikatra vṛttir na syād yatraiva hy ekaṃ tatraivāparam iti kathaṃ tayor viccheda iṣyate /
T06vasvvmsu:177: kathaṃ vā tad ekaṃ yat prāptaṃ ca tābhyāṃ na ca prāptam antarāle tac chūnyagrahaṇāt /
T06vasvvmsu:178: sūkṣmāṇāṃ caudakajantūnāṃ sthūlaiḥ samānarūpāṇām anīkṣaṇaṃ na syād /
T06vasvvmsu:179: yadi lakṣaṇabhedād eva dravyāntaratvaṃ kalpyate nānyathā /
T06vasvvmsu:182: tasyāsiddhau rūpādīnāṃ cakṣurādiviṣayatvam asiddham iti siddhaṃ vijñaptimātraṃ bhavatīti //
T06vasvvmsu:183: pramāṇavaśād astitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ vā nirdhāryate sarveṣāṃ ca pramāṇānāṃ pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ gariṣṭam ity asaty arthe katham iyaṃ buddhir bhavati pratyakṣam iti /
T06vasvvmsu:187: na so 'rtho dṛśyate tasya pratyakṣatvaṃ kathaṃ mataṃ // 16 //
T06vasvvmsu:188: yadā ca sā pratyakṣabuddhir bhavatīdaṃ me pratyakṣam iti tadā na so 'rtho dṛśyate
T06vasvvmsu:189: manovijñānenaiva paricchedāc cakṣurvijñānasya ca tadā niruddhatvād iti kathaṃ tasya
T06vasvvmsu:192: niruddham evaṃ tad rūpaṃ rasādikaṃ vā //
T06vasvvmsu:193: nānanubhūtaṃ manovijñānena smaryata ity avaśyam arthānubhavena bhavitavyaṃ tac ca darśanam ity evaṃ tadviṣayasya rūpādeḥ pratyakṣatvaṃ mataṃ
T06vasvvmsu:194: asiddham idam anubhūtasyārthasya smaraṇaṃ bhavatīti / yasmāt /
T06vasvvmsu:196: vināpy arthena yathārthābhāsā cakṣurvijñānādikā vijñaptir utpadyate tathoktaṃ /
T06vasvvmsu:198: tato hi vijñapteḥ smṛtisaṃprayuktā tatpratibhāsaiva rūpādivikalpikā manovijñaptir utpadyata iti na smṛtyutpādād arthānubhavaḥ sidhyati /
T06vasvvmsu:199: yadi yathā svapne vijñaptir abhūtārthaviṣayā tathā jāgrato 'pi syāt tathaiva tadabhāvaṃ lokaḥ svayam avagacchet /
T06vasvvmsu:201: tasmān na svapna ivārthopalabdhiḥ sarvā nirarthikā /
T06vasvvmsu:204: evaṃ vitathavikalpābhyāsavāsanānidrayā prasupto lokaḥ svapna ivābhūtam arthaṃ paśyan na prabuddhas tadabhāvaṃ yathāvan nāvagacchati /
T06vasvvmsu:205: yadā tu tatpratipakṣalokottaranirvikalpajñānalābhāt prabuddho bhavati tadā tatpṛṣṭhalabdhaśuddhalaukikajñānasaṃmukhībhāvād viṣayābhāvaṃ yathāvad avagacchatīti samānam etat //
T06vasvvmsu:206: yadi svasaṃtānapariṇāmaviśeṣād eva satvānām arthapratibhāsā vijñaptaya utpadyante nārthaviśeṣāt /
T06vasvvmsu:207: tadā ya eṣa pāpakalyāṇamitrasaṃparkāt sadasaddharmaśravaṇāc ca vijñaptiniyamaḥ sattvānāṃ sa kathaṃ sidhyati asati sadasatsaṃparke taddeśanāyāṃ ca /
T06vasvvmsu:209: sarveṣāṃ hi sattvānām anyonyavijñaptyādhipatyena mitho vijñapter niyamo bhavati yathāyogaṃ /
T06vasvvmsu:211: ataḥ saṃtānāntaravijñaptiviśeṣāt saṃtānāntare vijñaptiviśeṣa utpadyate nārthaviśeṣāt /
T06vasvvmsu:212: yadi yathā svapne nirarthikā vijñaptir evaṃ jāgrato 'pi syāt kasmāt kuśalākuśalasamudācāro suptāsuptayos tulyaṃ phalam iṣṭāniṣṭam āyatyāṃ na bhavati / yasmāt /
T06vasvvmsu:214: idam atra kāraṇāṃ na tv arthasadbhāvaḥ //
T06vasvvmsu:215: yadi vijñāptimātram evedaṃ na kasyacit kāyo 'sti na vāk //
T06vasvvmsu:218: atatkṛte vā tanmaraṇe katham aurabhrikādīnāṃ prāṇātipātāvadyena yogo bhavati /
T06vasvvmsu:225: tathā paravijñaptiviśeṣādhipatyāt pareṣāṃ jīvitendriyavirodhinī kācid vikriyotpadyate yayā sabhāgasaṃtativicchedākhyaṃ maraṇaṃ bhavatīti veditavyaṃ
T06vasvvmsu:228: manodaṇḍasya hi mahāsāvadyatvaṃ sādhayatā bhagavatopālir gṛhapatiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ /
T06vasvvmsu:229: kaccit te gṛhapate śrutaṃ kena tāni daṇḍakāraṇyāni mātaṅgāraṇyāni kaliṅgāraṇyāni śūnyāni medhyībhūtāni /
T06vasvvmsu:231: śrutaṃ me bho gautama ṛṣīṇāṃ manaḥpradoṣeṇeti /
T06vasvvmsu:232: manodaṇḍo mahāvadyaḥ kathaṃ vā tena sidhyati // 20 //
T06vasvvmsu:234: tadabhiprasannair amānuṣais tadvāsinaḥ sattvā utsāditā na tv ṛṣīṇāṃ manaḥpradoṣān
T06vasvvmsu:235: mṛtā ity evaṃ sati kathaṃ tena karmaṇā manodaṇḍaḥ kāyavāgdaṇḍābhyāṃ mahāvadyatamaḥ siddho bhavati /
T06vasvvmsu:237: yadi vijñaptimātram evedaṃ paracittavidaḥ kiṃ paracittaṃ jānanty atha na /
T06vasvvmsu:239: yadi na jānanti kathaṃ paracittavido bhavanti /
T06vasvvmsu:246: tathā tadajñānāt tadubhayaṃ na yathārthaṃ vitathapratibhāsatayā grāhyagrāhakavikalpasyāprahīṇatvāt //
T06vasvvmsu:249: kṛteyaṃ sarvathā sā tu na cintyā
T06vasvvmsu:250: sarvaprakārā tu sā mādṛśaiś cintayituṃ na śakyate /
T06vasvvmsu:252: kasya punaḥ sā sarvathā gocara ity āha /
T06vasvvmsu:254: buddhānāṃ hi sā bhagavatāṃ sarvaprakāraṃ gocaraḥ sarvākārasarvajñeyajñānāvighātād iti //
